title: overmind22
author: overmind22
content: Hi,I am looking to purchase a Bitmain Antminer L7 9.05, 9.3 or 9.5 model. If you have one and would like to sell, please PM me. I will be using the [Suspicious link removed] will also work too. Have no problem paying for the L7 in cryptocurrency as long as there's escrow. I am located in US.Thank you,

comments.author: burky155
comments.body: Quote from: Miningcrate on July 24, 2022, 06:06:05 PMHave some used https://t.me/mininghardwaresalesThis is a telegram SCAMMER please becareful and only use escrow on this forum, never deal outside the forum.
